title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 August 2014 - XWiki
content:
<lucaa> has quit  
02:15 <sburjan> has quit  
04:31 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
05:12 <joel2> has quit  
05:46 <OSIMasson> has quit  
06:51 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:02 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:11 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
07:16 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
07:22 <joel2> has joined #xwiki  
07:42 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
07:58 <Denis> has quit  
08:16 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <tmortagne> Hi guys  
08:43 <tmortagne> most of the failing test on jenkins seems to be because of  
08:43 <tmortagne> java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: hudson.model.AbstractBuild.getTestResultAction()Lhudson/tasks/test/AbstractTestResultAction;  
08:44 <tmortagne> I guess some API changed in the last version  
08:45 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:46 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
08:48 <vmassol> good morning  
08:48 <vmassol> - fixing blocker issues  
08:48 <vmassol> - fixing the build  
08:48 <vmassol> on my side I've progressed well yesterday on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10833 but couldn't finish it for the BFD. I'm continuing this morning  
08:55 <vmassol> tmortagne: restarting jenkins, there were 2 plugins that had newer versions  
08:55 <tmortagne> btw we have lots of plugins with probably some of them useless like LDAP plugin  
08:55 <vmassol> yes I started disalbing several  
08:55 <vmassol> for some I didn't know if we were using them or not  
08:55 <vmassol> I'll continue disabling some now  
09:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: restarted 2 jobs, let's see how it goes now  
09:05 <vmassol> one of the plugin I updated was the email ext plugin so there's hope  
09:07 <tmortagne> maybe  
09:08 <tmortagne> I doubt we need PAM Authentication plugin  
09:08 <tmortagne> this is to connect to jenkins using the system users  
09:09 <tmortagne> also we don't really care about Translation Assistance plugin ourself  
09:09 <vmassol> I removed all those plugins once but jenkins was not restarting so I put them back  
09:10 <vmassol> (I tried this a few days ago)  
09:10 <tmortagne> PAM Authentication plugin ?  
09:10 <vmassol> I think I kept the PAM one but the other ones you mentioned I removed  
09:10 <vmassol> I'll try again but this time one by one  
09:11 <vmassol> have you disabled the PAM one?  
09:15 <tmortagne> started but looks like I need to restart to actually disable it so I did not do it  
09:15 <vmassol> ok  
09:16 <vmassol> let me check the 2 running jobs status  
09:16 <vmassol> one is almost done  
09:20 <vmassol> Denis: no signed script work anymore for 6.2? You have 2 issues listed on the roadmap! :)  
09:21 <Denis> no time for that hopelessly, not abandoned, but delayed at least, would be nice to have some help on this :)  
09:22 <vmassol> I highly doubt you'll get any help on this topic, unless you ask simple questions on the list :)  
09:23 <Denis> It is mainly a matter of priority, anyway, and it seems we have more and more issue that we expect to solve with signed scripts  
09:23 <Denis> the complex part is done  
09:23 <vmassol> indeed  
09:23 <vmassol> and in addition  
09:23 <vmassol> now that we know that signed scripts are coming  
09:23 <vmassol> we're delaying other solutions...  
09:23 <Denis> we need to integrate, and as you know, I have less time for that now  
09:24 <Denis> this is why, if we want that to speed up, working in team would help  
09:24 <vmassol> it could be nice that you send a mail on the list explaining the status and what's left to do precisely  
09:24 <vmassol> you could try finding someone interested  
09:25 <vmassol> all the people I know are busy on stuff for 6.2 already  
09:25 <vmassol> roadmap for 6.3 is not done yet though  
09:26 <Denis> I am afraid, it will be short for 6.2, but having it in 6.x seems still possible if I get some help  
09:28 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <vmassol> tmortagne: I hope this is fixing some bugs because we need to stabilize now for RC1 :)  
09:49 <tmortagne> JGroups minor version is always about bugfixing  
10:12 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <Denis> has quit  
10:15 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <polx> has quit  
10:36 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
10:40 <tmortagne> vmassol: do we want to keep 6.0.x in jenkins ?  
10:40 <tmortagne> we should remove it IMO  
10:41 <vmassol> tmortagne: yes I'm ok to remove it and to remove the branch  
10:42 <vmassol> and the jira versions  
10:42 <vmassol> maybe a mail?  
10:42 <vmassol> in case someone needed a 6.0.2  
10:46 <tmortagne> I don't plan to remove the branch rigth now but it makes jenkins do useless work IMO, we can always put them back later  
10:46 <vmassol> I think the email would be good since I don't tgink we need a 6.0.x  
10:46 <vmassol> I can do it if you want  
10:47 <vmassol> tmortagne: it's not useless if we want a 6.0.2  
10:47 <vmassol> especially since it breaks  
10:47 <tmortagne> talking about jenkins  
10:47 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <vmassol> actually wait it's 6.1 breaking  
10:48 <vmassol> where's 6.0 on jenkins?  
10:48 <vmassol> I don't see it  
10:48 <tmortagne> that's because I removed it  
10:49 <vmassol> I personaly don't agree to remove anyihtng on jenkins  
10:49 <vmassol> if we have the branch and the jira version  
10:49 <tmortagne> we don't support 6.0 branch  
10:49 <vmassol> if we want a release we need to ensure it continues to work at all times  
10:49 <vmassol> you say it but it's not official  
10:49 <vmassol> some people have done efforts  
10:49 <vmassol> in merging their work on the 6.0.x branch  
10:50 <vmassol> we need to be sure we don't want to release a 6.0.x  
10:50 <vmassol> but I don't know about others  
10:51 <tmortagne> "you say it but it's not official", really ?  
10:51 <vmassol> especially since we arlady released a 6.0.1  
10:51 <tmortagne> are you mixing 6.1 et 6.0 ?  
10:52 <vmassol> no  
10:52 <tmortagne> of course it's official that we don't support any other branch than the stable, dev and latest cycle  
10:52 <vmassol> no  
10:52 <vmassol> this is a bug fix release  
10:53 <vmassol> from 6.0.1  
10:53 <vmassol> anyway it's faster to send an email than to argue pointlessly here  
10:53 <vmassol> doing it  
10:53 <tmortagne> and ? we don't support 6..x officially again  
10:59 <vmassol> ahgain  
10:59 <vmassol> jenkins, git and jira go toegtehr  
11:00 <tmortagne> we merge stuff on it by reflex that's all  
11:00 <vmassol> it's one or nothing, if you don't do this then you break the dev process  
11:00 <vmassol> s/one/all  
11:00 <vmassol> in the end I'm pretty we'll all agree about dropping 6.0.2  
11:00 <vmassol> \*sure  
11:00 <vmassol> but by deference it's nice to ask and to remove the 3 things  
11:01 <vmassol> for ex, in my mail I also mention I'd like to do a 6.2.1 and 6.2.2 releases  
11:01 <vmassol> (without asking me)

11:35 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
11:41 <polx> has quit  
11:47 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <tmortagne> vmassol: java.lang.NullPointerException with the new mail plugin version it seems  
11:52 <tmortagne> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-jmeter/187/console  
11:56 <Pbas1> has joined #xwiki  
11:56 <bouquetf\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <Lyes1> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <polx> has quit  
12:09 <Pbas> has quit  
12:09 <bouquetf> has quit  
12:16 <vmassol> tmortagne: checking  
12:17 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:22 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <polx> has quit  
12:26 <sdumitriu2> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <vmassol> tmortagne: I've raised https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-24506  
12:26 <polx> has quit  
12:26 <vmassol> what we can do is rollback the emailext plugin I guess to see if it comes from the plugin  
12:27 <vmassol> going to lunch now, I'll look at this after  
12:28 <tmortagne> vmassol: if we rollback just the plugin we will get back the other issue  
12:28 <vmassol> tmortagne: what's strange is that it only happens for this job I think  
12:28 <vmassol> tmortagne: not to 2.38.1, before  
12:28 <vmassol> for ex see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/5994/console  
12:29 <vmassol> the email was sent correctly  
12:29 <tmortagne> maybe it depends what kind of email it's sending  
12:30 <tmortagne> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/5994/console is an error email while it's a warning for the other job  
12:30 <vmassol> maybe, we can check with other jobs  
12:30 <vmassol> if we have any...  
12:30 <vmassol> (any failing that is)  
12:30 <tmortagne> we will :)  
12:31 <vmassol> we could restart http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform\_Sonar/232/console  
12:32 <vmassol> doign that and then off to lunch  
12:32 <vmassol> actually it's already building  
12:32 <vmassol> you started it :)  
12:34 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
12:34 <Slashman> has quit  
12:34 <sburjan> has quit  
12:34 <tekzilla> has quit

12:34 <tmortagne> vmassol: btw it was trying to send a mail to warn that XWiki seems to be slower recently  
12:35 <vmassol> yes I also feel this

13:43 <polx> has quit  
14:03 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:08 <Denis1> has quit  
14:38 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:52 <vmassol> guys and tmortagne: WDYT of applying http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCOMMONS-635 now for RC1? Tests are still passing and it fixes some issues  
14:53 <tmortagne> +1  
14:53 <vmassol> (there's always a risk but I'll follow up and revet if anything big happens)  
14:53 <vmassol> ok  
14:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: hmmm  
14:57 <vmassol> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-jmeter/188/console  
14:57 <vmassol> what I did was edit and resave the job config as they suggested  
14:57 <vmassol> apparently the issue was "An attempt to send an e-mail to empty list of recipients, ignored." AFAICS  
14:58 <vmassol> checking that  
14:58 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
14:58 <tmortagne> ok  
14:59 <vmassol> indeed recipient lit is empty  
14:59 <vmassol> is that on purpose?  
14:59 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-jmeter/configure  
14:59 <vmassol> checking other jobs  
15:00 <vmassol> actually it's the same  
15:01 <vmassol> checking my scriptlet script  
15:01 <vmassol> I think it was defaulting to the global default before  
15:02 <vmassol> ah no  
15:02 <vmassol> it's different  
15:02 <vmassol> different from http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Commons/job/xwiki-commons/configure for ex  
15:02 <vmassol> so the question is whether you did it on purpose or not tmortagne?  
15:03 <vmassol> for the other jobs we send the email to 4 categories of people  
15:03 <vmassol> maybe you didn't want to send false positives?  
15:05 <tmortagne> I don't remember emptying that list, what I did at first to not receive false positive is not enabled comparison  
15:05 <tmortagne> anyway if it's working now then great  
15:06 <vmassol> yup the question is whether we should leave the list empty or not  
15:06 <tmortagne> s/enabled/enable/  
15:06 <vmassol> I don't know the status of this job  
15:06 <vmassol> and what it's comapring  
15:06 <tmortagne> it should go to notification IMO  
15:06 <tmortagne> as I told you this morining it was trying to send a mail because XWiki was becoming slower  
15:08 <tmortagne> as you can see in the configuration I told it to warning for over 20% variation to not get too much mails, will see later if we lower it  
15:08 <tmortagne> s/warning/warn/  
15:09 <tmortagne> it compare with the previous build  
15:09 <vmassol> done  
15:09 <vmassol> we should now receive emails  
15:19 <msmeria> has quit  
15:21 <DarkKnightCZ> hi, what about https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/305 ? I use this api in one component and it isn't quite convenient to patch every release :) (and since rendering cache now works, i guess it's good to provide some API)  
15:23 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: nothing against it but a related jira issue would be nice  
15:24 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: ok, there isn't one as far as i know, i will look there and create one  
15:25 <tmortagne> yes I don't think there is one  
15:32 <DarkKnightCZ> done, XWIKI-10897  
15:46 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:47 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
16:00 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: thanks, I have something to finish first and will take care of it  
16:00 <DarkKnightCZ> great, thanks
